data.name: PageTitle
data.value: Lex "ITBeard" Kartynnik's website

data.name: About
data.value: Hey!

data.name: About_Paragraph_1
data.value: My name is Lex Kartynnik , I am from Belarus, now I live in Poland and have been working in IT since 2011.

data.name: About_Paragraph_2
data.value: I worked as a software engineer for the first 10 years (backend, C#, .NET, Azure), and since 2021 I've been developing IT communities. Some people call it working with developers.

data.name: About_Paragraph_3
data.value: In parallel with my main job, I do a lot of IT, near-scientific and other technical content on YouTube under the pseudonym Lex ITBeard .

data.name: About_Paragraph_4
data.value: On this web site you gonna to learn a little bit more about all my projects ðŸ˜Š

data.name: Interesting_GitHub_Paragraph_1
data.value: Being a software developer since 2011, I have had several small opensource projects.

data.name: Interesting_GitHub_Paragraph_2
data.value: You can look through them on my GitHub. And maybe even commit something ðŸ˜‰

data.name: Interesting_LinkedIn_Paragrarh_1
data.value: On LinkedIn you can find information about my professional experience and an old resume.

data.name: Interesting_LinkedIn_Paragrarh_2
data.value: There you can also see what ship and what I'm working on now.

data.name: Interesting_Merch_Paragraph_1
data.value: In life and in videos I appear in unusual sweatshirts, T-shirts, etc. You can buy the same in my store.

data.name: Interesting_Merch_Paragraph_2
data.value: Every purchase you make will support me by $5! ðŸ˜Š

data.name: Interesting_News_Paragraph_1
data.value: For those who support me, every month I record a podcast called Â«Beard NewsÂ». In this podcast I talk about IT gossip, events in my life, new and old content, and upcoming plans.

data.name: Interesting_News_Paragraph_2
data.value: Solocast is available to ITBeard sponsors and all patrons on Patreon.
